about_the_game:
The Final Exhibition is a challenging horror game that changes each time you play it. Encounter various monsters, explore different environments, and uncover the mysteries surrounding his final exhibition.

FEATURES

  • Face off against multiple entities, each with their own unique behaviors
  • Adapt to the evolving maze and monsters as you progress
  • Unravel the web of mysteries surrounding the exhibition with every run
  • Explore procedurally generated levels

Equipped with a camera, flashlight, and radar, you are tasked with locating multiple objects of importance and documenting them in your journal. Beware of the creatures stalking the halls and be ready to adapt. As you acquire more tools and knowledge, they grow to match...
